headerDisplay: A calendar plugin for homebridge, which allows flexible scheduling of triggers using any iCal calendar.
footerDisplay: For detailed description of parameters, see: https://github.com/grover/homebridge-calendar

name.title: Calendar Name
name.description: A unique name for the calendar. Will be used as the accessory name and default switch for any calendar events.

url.title: iCal URL
url.description: The address of the calender. Can be a webcal://, a http:// or an https:// URL.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval
pollingInterval.description: The polling interval the plugin uses to retrieve calendar updates in minutes. If not set, the plugin will update the calendar once every 15 minutes.

offset.title: Event start time offset
offset.description: Amount of time, in days (Xd), hours (Xh), minutes (Xm), or seconds (Xs) to trigger the sensors before the scheduled event start time. Examples are: 2d (two days prior), 8h (eight hours prior), 15m (15 minutes prior), and 10s (ten seconds prior).

sensors.title: Sensors
sensors.description: A contact sensor name that will be set to open if the calendar event name starts with the sensor name.
